summary: This document is an email chain between attorneys discussing scheduling a call regarding the Epstein case in the Southern District of New York (SDNY). The emails show coordination among legal team members to arrange a meeting time.

persons.name: Daniel J. Kaiser
persons.context: Attorney involved in the Epstein case, coordinating call schedules with other legal team members.

persons.name: Kimberly Lerner
persons.context: Attorney involved in the Epstein case, attending a charity function and suggesting a Monday meeting time.

keyFacts: The document shows legal team coordination for the Epstein case in July 2019.
Multiple attorneys are involved in scheduling discussions for case-related calls.
The correspondence indicates ongoing legal activity in the SDNY Epstein case during this period.
